name: Ninja Love (itch)
description:
How to play? 

Simple, the important thing is not to hit the black heart🖤. 

Commands:

Mouse click and drag✅

P--> Paus

ESC--> exit

Small pixel art game developed for the Game Jam ' ' Valentine's Day "❤ ️ 

The game could be updated in the future with new modes and other content. 💯
